name: ccrack
short_description: ccrack can use rulefiles (files that control transformations) to generate a wordlist (based on an existing one). Then you can feed that wordlist to a C program that will if any of the hashes of those words matches the hash you are trying to crack. It also has other tools, like a hacking header file and a benchmarker and a random password generator - dont use a password that can be cracked! This project is very unfinished though and I will update it soon. If you also have updated code, please send it to my email.
summary: ccrack is a fast password cracker for cracking crypt() salted hashes.
